people_also_ask.question: Will there be a Metal Gear Solid 6?
people_also_ask.heading: Metal Gear Solid 6 is sadly never happening due to the falling out between Konami and Hideo Kojima, and the lack of a sufficient story to tell. ... Any chance of another sequel died with the release of Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain, though.15-Sep-2021

people_also_ask.question: What is Metal Gear Solid 1 called?
people_also_ask.heading: You may be looking for Metal Gear: Ghost Babel, which was released outside of Japan as Metal Gear Solid. Metal Gear Solid (メタルギアソリッド, Metaru Gia Soriddo?, commonly abbreviated as MGS or MGS1) is a stealth action video-game directed by Hideo Kojima.

people_also_ask.question: Is Metal Gear Solid a remake of Metal Gear?
people_also_ask.heading: Metal Gear Solid was followed up by the sequel Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty released in November 2001 for the PlayStation 2. A remake of the original Metal Gear Solid called Metal Gear Solid: The Twin Snakes was made for the Nintendo GameCube in early 2004....Games.

knowledge_panel.description: metal gear solid is a stealth game developed by konami and released for the playstation in 1998. it was directed, produced, and written by hideo kojima, and follows the msx2 video games metal gear and metal gear 2: solid snake, which kojima also worked on. wikipedia
